title: Megami Tantei Vinus File (Detective Goddess)
synopsis: When this beautiful detective duo takes on a new case involving drugs and rape, it brings back painful memories for Rio, whose sister was killed by a gang of sex-starved drug dealers. Could the same gang be responsible for this new threat? Hot-headed as she is, Rio must learn to control her anger in order to uncover the truth.
related_anime: ['Shin-ban Megami Tantei Vinus File', 'Megami Tantei -Vinus File-']
